title: Democrats react to Sen. Padilla incident
shortDescription: Rep. Max Frost called for Congress to "subpoena Kristi Noem" after Sen. Padilla was forced out of a DHS presser.

title: Trump DOJ sues NY over immigration enforcement in state courts
shortDescription: New York's 2020 law doesn’t apply to federal courthouses or immigration court, according to the legislation’s author.

title: House votes to rescind billions in funding
shortDescription: Republican lawmakers won a House vote 214-212 to take back billions in public broadcasting and foreign aid funding.

title: Democrats furious over Padilla being hauled out of Noem briefing
shortDescription: The incident came amid mass protests over Immigration and Customs Enforcement raids in Southern California.

title: Trump's unprecedented list of pardons are raising eyebrows
shortDescription: In his second term, President Donald Trump has granted clemency to convicted murderers and extortionists. Is this legal?

title: DHS ends temporary Biden-era protections for Cubans, Venezuelans
shortDescription: The Department of Homeland Security ended temporary immigration protections for 530,000 Cubans, Haitians, Nicaraguans and Venezuelans

title: 15,000 foreigners in line for $5 million 'gold card,' Trump says
shortDescription: Trump touts the program as a "once in a lifetime opportunity," though it comes with a required $5 million payment to the U.S. government.

title: Trump warns Israeli attack could 'blow' Iran nuke talks
shortDescription: "As long as I think there is an agreement, I don't want them going in, because I think that would blow it," Trump said of U.S.-Iran negotiations.

title: Trump to curb farm, hotel worker deportations
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says his administration is planning to reverse course on deportations of migrant farm and hospitality workers.

title: Trump on rift with Musk: 'Elon doesn't like me so much'
shortDescription: At a bill signing event at the White House, Trump invoked his high-profile former aide, saying "Now I know why Elon doesn't like me so much."

title: Trump wins House approval to take back foreign aid, NPR, PBS funding
shortDescription: The House GOP overcame internal divisions to approve Trump's request to claw back $9.4 billion in spending on foreign aid and public broadcasting.

title: King Trump? 'We're not a king' says the president
shortDescription: Indivisible, a progressive group said it's holding protests to “reject authoritarianism' on Trump's birthday

title: Josh Hawley introduces bill to raise federal minimum wage to $15
shortDescription: Ultraconservative Sen. Josh Hawley introduced a bill with Sen. Peter Welch to raise the federal minimum wage to $15 an hour.

title: Trump got boos and cheers at Kennedy Center. See his approval ratings
shortDescription: How popular is Trump? Approval ratings show historic lows even though his own ratings have gotten better. He was booed, applauded at a "Les Mis" show

title: Trump calls Fed chair a 'numbskull' as he pushes interest rate cut
shortDescription: Trump cited new inflation data in continuing to pressure Powell to lower interest rates.

title: Congressional Baseball Game sets fundraising record as Republicans win
shortDescription: The game wasn’t all that close as the Republicans routed the Democrats 13-2 for their fifth win in a row.

title: Trump says too many migrant farmers, hotel workers are being deported
shortDescription: President Trump said he plans to make changes to his administration's aggressive crackdown on illegal immigration to address worker shortages.

title: Trump, Rand Paul go back-and-forth on White House picnic invitation
shortDescription: Donald Trump said Kentucky Republican Sen. Rand Paul and his family are invited to the White House picnic after Paul claimed they were “uninvited.”

title: Oklahoma executes John Hanson after Trump administration cleared way
shortDescription: Oklahoma had scheduled John Hanson's execution for Dec. 15, 2022, but the Biden administration blocked his transfer from federal custody to the state.
